article: belgian prime minister jean-luc unk on monday said he was ready to make sweeping changes to the criminal justice system after a huge emotion-charged protest over the handling of a macabre child sex and murder case that has rocked the nation .
abstract: belgian pm promises judicial reform after mass protest
